title: "Covid-19 Accelerating the Adoption of Robotics in Supply Chains"
excerpt: "Most of the manufacturers said COVID-19 will affect their supply chain operations, as per an ongoing study by PwC. Over 40% were worried about the consequences for their workforce and a reduction in efficiency to which Robotics can help."
